long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is a color-picker extension that helps to pick the color scheme related to the provided color. 

This can be highly useful when ding front-end development or Web-Design, as it will give the developer color-scheme related to their selected color. And using that scheme can beautify the web-view as well as user-experience.
